segments.text: I'm looking at a kitchen, a very active one indeed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused, doing her dishes with great care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my eyes are drawn to the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool beneath him looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, almost like it's dancing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it wobbling slightly as he moves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could easily tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could be quite painful for a child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine him landing on that wet floor, perhaps hitting his head.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation makes me feel a knot of anxiety in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I truly hope he doesn't lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a truly dangerous game he's playing for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR
